name: Git Gud (Illya Shkorubs'ky)
description:
Description

A practice game for the lovers of the Dark Souls Franchise.

Git Gud is a game where the player is faced in a series of duels against noble knights. With the usage of techniques like dodge rolling, blocking, parrying and attacking the goal is to get through as many opponents as possible before your life reaches zero.

How to play
  • You can Parry an enemy attack if you time your blocking;
  • Some actions consume stamina;
  • You won't be able to perform actions without stamina;
  • Kill the enemy to go to the next round.
Controls
  • Use "WASD" keys to move;
  • Hold "Left Shift" to sprint or press it briefly to dodge roll;
  • Click the "Left Mouse Button" to attack or hold the "Right Mouse Button" to block.
